sqlparse.formatter
==================

.. py:module:: sqlparse.formatter

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   SQL formatter



Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

   sqlparse.formatter.validate_options
   sqlparse.formatter.build_filter_stack


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:function:: validate_options(options)

   Validates options.


.. py:function:: build_filter_stack(stack, options)

   Setup and return a filter stack.

   :param stack: :class:`~sqlparse.filters.FilterStack` instance
   :param options: Dictionary with options validated by validate_options.
